LongDescription:
This is SnowBoardTV, the worlds first tvOS theming engine!

It works with tvOS 11 - 13.x and supports formats from all other popular theming engines.


SnowBoardTV includes the following features:

	•	App Icon Theming 
	•	App Icon Masks 
	•	App Icon Shadow Customization 
	•	App Icon Label Customization 
	•	Background Wallpapers 

Coming soon:

	•	Glyph Theming 
	•	Respring Logos 
	•	Fonts and more!

More themes will be available for tvOS soon on the JoshTV repository!


If you like the work put into SnowBoardTV, you can show your support by following Spark and Dennis D. Bednarz on twitter and donating to Spark's Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/SparkDev) and Bednarz's PayPal (https://www.paypal.me/denaxin).

For further help please contact Spark on Twitter @SparkDev_ or join my Discord server (https://discord.gg/aYgD69T)
